name: Lisa
storytext: Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.
source: Reward for inviting Lisa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Lightning Touch
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114091]</color> to opposing active character.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Conductive</color> to opposing active character.
skills.description: Deals 1 Electro DMG, attach Conductive to opposing active character.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114091]</color> is not attached to the opponent's active character, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114091]</color> will be attached.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>. If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Conductive</color> is not attached to the opponent's active character, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Conductive</color> will be attached.
skills.description: Deals 2 Electro DMG. If Conductive is not attached to the opponent's active character, Conductive will be attached.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114092]</color>. The opponent's active character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114091]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>. Summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>Lightning Rose</color>. The opponent's active character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Conductive</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Electro DMG. Summons Lightning Rose. The opponent's active character gains Conductive.
